name: LaPain
description:
LaPain is a fast paced classic shoot'em up where you play as the hot-tempered Spitfire, on a chase after his stolen carrot. Spitfire has to fend off Sneko the Solids army  of ships, to be able to reach the carrot and defeat his enemy for good!

The ship is controlled by using the WASD keys, and the cannon is controlled by the mouse cursor. Left click to shoot missiles and right click to use the grapple-hook to grab items. The more damage the ship takes, the faster it will be able to shoot!

The game concept  was created by another group as part of a uni assignment, and was then realized by our team, Namtar:

Sini Tang - Project manager
Marina Arknell - Game Designer
Emil Gårdh - Game programmer
Devon Jokic - Game graphics
 Emma Österlund - Game graphics

All music and sound effects utilized in Lapain are free sound assets.
